episodes.title: Episode 1: Introduction to Podcasting
episodes.description: In this episode, we discuss the basics of podcasting and how to get started.

episodes.title: Episode 2: Equipment and Setup
episodes.description: We cover the essential equipment needed for podcasting and how to set it up.

episodes.title: Episode 3: Recording Techniques
episodes.description: Learn about different recording techniques to improve your podcast quality.

episodes.title: Episode 4: Editing Your Podcast
episodes.description: Tips and tricks for editing your podcast to make it sound professional.

episodes.title: Episode 5: Publishing and Promotion
episodes.description: How to publish your podcast and promote it to reach a wider audience.
